mapper.select:
SELECT MODULE_ID ,MODULE_NM ,MODULE_DESC ,STUDY_LVL ,SLIDE_SPEED ,MODULE_TYPE ,LEARNING_TYPE ,TIME_LIMIT ,USE_YN ,QUESTION_CNT ,GUN_SCORE ,EXPLOSIVES_SCORE ,LIVE_AMMUNITION_SCORE ,SWORD_SCORE ,WEAPON_SCORE ,CAMOUFLAGE_WEAPON_SCORE ,TOOL_LIFE_SCORE ,FLAMMABILITY_SCORE ,DANGER_MATERIALS_SCORE ,LIQUID_GEL_SCORE
,FAIL_TO_PASS ,INSERT_ID ,INSERT_DATE ,UPDATE_ID ,UPDATE_DATE ,MENU_CD FROM XBT_MODULE_INFO_MASTER ORDER BY MODULE_ID DESC

SELECT MODULE_ID ,MODULE_NM ,MODULE_DESC ,0 AS GUN_CNT ,0 AS EXPLOSIVES_CNT ,0 AS LIVE_AMMUNITION_CNT ,0 AS SWORD_CNT ,0 AS WEAPON_CNT ,0 AS CAMOUFLAGE_WEAPON_CNT ,0 AS TOOL_LIFE_CNT ,0 AS FLAMMABILITY_CNT ,0 AS DANGER_MATERIALS_CNT ,0 AS LIQUID_GEL_CNT ,0 AS PASS_CNT ,TIME_LIMIT ,STUDY_LVL ,SLIDE_SPEED ,MODULE_TYPE ,LEARNING_TYPE ,USE_YN ,QUESTION_CNT ,GUN_SCORE ,EXPLOSIVES_SCORE ,LIVE_AMMUNITION_SCORE ,SWORD_SCORE ,WEAPON_SCORE ,CAMOUFLAGE_WEAPON_SCORE ,TOOL_LIFE_SCORE ,FLAMMABILITY_SCORE ,DANGER_MATERIALS_SCORE ,LIQUID_GEL_SCORE
,FAIL_TO_PASS ,INSERT_ID ,INSERT_DATE ,UPDATE_ID ,UPDATE_DATE ,MENU_CD FROM XBT_MODULE_INFO_MASTER WHERE MODULE_ID = #{moduleId}

SELECT T1.MODULE_DETAIL_ID , T1.MODULE_ID , T1.STUDY_LVL , T1.BAG_SCAN_ID , T1.UNIT_ID , T1.UNIT_GROUP_CD , T2.GROUP_NAME , T1.ACTION_DIV , T1.ACTION_DIV_NAME , T2.OPEN_YN/*개봉여부*/ , T2.PASS_YN/*통과여부*/ , T1.INSERT_ID , T1.INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_MODULE_INFO_DETAIL T1 INNER JOIN XBT_UNIT_GROUP T2 ON T1.UNIT_GROUP_CD = T2.UNIT_GROUP_CD WHERE T1.MODULE_ID = #{moduleId}

SELECT T1.BAG_SCAN_NO, T1.BAG_SCAN_ID, T1.UNIT_ID,/*정답물품아이디*/ (SELECT UNIT_NAME FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO WHERE UNIT_ID = T1.UNIT_ID) as unitName,/*정답물품명*/ T3.OPEN_YN,/*개봉여부*/ T3.PASS_YN,/*통과여부*/ T3.UNIT_GROUP_CD , T3.GROUP_NAME , T3.ACTION_DIV, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM XBT_COMMON_CODE T2 WHERE T2.GROUP_ID = 'actionDiv' AND T2.CODE_VALUE = T3.ACTION_DIV AND T2.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T2.LANGUAGE_CODE = 'kr')AS actionDivName, T1.STUDY_LVL, /*학습레벨*/ T1.USE_YN ,/*사용여부*/ T1.INSERT_ID, T1.INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_BAG_INFO T1 INNER JOIN XBT_UNIT_GROUP T3 ON T1.UNIT_GROUP_CD = T3.UNIT_GROUP_CD AND STUDY_LVL = #{studyLvl} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{questionCnt}

SELECT T1.BAG_SCAN_NO, T1.BAG_SCAN_ID, T1.UNIT_ID,/*정답물품아이디*/ (SELECT UNIT_NAME FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO WHERE UNIT_ID = T1.UNIT_ID) as unitName,/*정답물품명*/ T3.OPEN_YN,/*개봉여부*/ T3.PASS_YN,/*통과여부*/ T3.UNIT_GROUP_CD , T3.GROUP_NAME , T3.ACTION_DIV, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM XBT_COMMON_CODE T2 WHERE T2.GROUP_ID = 'actionDiv' AND T2.CODE_VALUE = T3.ACTION_DIV AND T2.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T2.LANGUAGE_CODE = 'kr')AS actionDivName, T1.STUDY_LVL, /*학습레벨*/ T1.USE_YN ,/*사용여부*/ T1.INSERT_ID, T1.INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_BAG_INFO T1 INNER JOIN XBT_UNIT_GROUP T3 ON T1.UNIT_GROUP_CD = T3.UNIT_GROUP_CD ORDER BY BAG_SCAN_ID ASC

SELECT T1.BAG_SCAN_NO, T1.BAG_SCAN_ID, T1.UNIT_ID,/*정답물품아이디*/ (SELECT UNIT_NAME FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO WHERE UNIT_ID = T1.UNIT_ID) as unitName,/*정답물품명*/ T3.OPEN_YN,/*개봉여부*/ T3.PASS_YN,/*통과여부*/ T3.UNIT_GROUP_CD, T3.GROUP_NAME, T3.ACTION_DIV, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM XBT_COMMON_CODE T2 WHERE T2.GROUP_ID = 'actionDiv' AND T2.CODE_VALUE = T3.ACTION_DIV AND T2.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T2.LANGUAGE_CODE = 'kr')AS actionDivName, T1.STUDY_LVL, /*학습레벨*/ T1.USE_YN ,/*사용여부*/ T1.INSERT_ID, T1.INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_BAG_INFO T1 INNER JOIN XBT_UNIT_GROUP T3 ON T1.UNIT_GROUP_CD = T3.UNIT_GROUP_CD AND T1.BAG_SCAN_ID = #{bagScanId}
SELECT POINTS_STD_ID /* 배점기준ID */ ,POINTS_STD_NM /* 배점기준명칭 */ ,POINTS_STD_DC /* 배점기준설명 */ ,USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ FROM XBT_POINTS_STD_INFO /* XBT배점기준정보 Table */ ORDER BY POINTS_STD_ID /* 배점기준ID */

SELECT POINTS_STD_ID /* 배점기준ID */ ,ACTION_DIV AS ACTION_DIV /* ACTION구분 */ ,FN_GET_COMCODE_NAME('0002', ACTION_DIV ,'kr') AS ACTION_NM /* ACTION구분명 */ ,NVL(BAN_UNIT_SCORE,0) AS BAN_UNIT_SCORE /* 금지물품점수 */ ,NVL(LIMIT_UNIT_SCORE,0) AS LIMIT_UNIT_SCORE /* 제한물품점수 */ ,NVL(QUESTION_UNIT_SCORE,0) AS QUESTION_UNIT_SCORE /* 의심물품점수 */ ,NVL(PASS_UNIT_SCORE,0) AS PASS_UNIT_SCORE /* 통과물품점수 */ FROM XBT_POINTS_STD_DC t1

SELECT A.EDU_TYPE_ID /* 교육타입ID */ ,A.EDU_TYPE_NM /* 교육타입명칭 */ ,A.EDU_TYPE_DC /* 교육타입설명 */ ,A.USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ ,A.POINTS_STD_ID /* 배점기준ID */ ,B.POINTS_STD_NM /* 배점기준명칭 */ ,A.INSERT_ID /* 등록자ID */ ,A.INSERT_DATE /* 등록일 */ ,A.UPDATE_ID /* 수정자ID */ ,A.UPDATE_DATE /* 수정일 */ FROM XBT_EDU_TYPE_INFO A /* XTS교육타입상세 TABLE */ LEFT JOIN XBT_POINTS_STD_INFO B ON A.POINTS_STD_ID = B.POINTS_STD_ID
SELECT POINTS_STD_NO, POINTS_STD_NM, POINTS_STD_DC, USE_YN, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_ID FROM XBT_POINTS_STD_MASTER
SELECT POINTS_STD_NO, POINTS_STD_NM, POINTS_STD_DC, USE_YN, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_ID FROM XBT_POINTS_STD_MASTER WHERE POINTS_STD_NO = #{pointsStdNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO XBT_POINTS_STD_MASTER ( POINTS_STD_NM, POINTS_STD_DC, USE_YN, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_ID )VALUES( #{pointsStdNm}, #{pointsStdDc}, 'Y', now(), #{insertId} )
mapper.select: SELECT POINTS_DETAIL_NO, POINTS_STD_NO, ACTION_DIV, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM XBT_COMMON_CODE T2 WHERE T2.GROUP_ID = 'actionDiv' AND T2.CODE_VALUE = ACTION_DIV AND T2.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T2.LANGUAGE_CODE = 'kr')AS actionDivName, BAN_UNIT_SCORE, LIMIT_UNIT_SCORE, QUESTION_UNIT_SCORE, PASS_UNIT_SCORE, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID FROM XBT_POINTS_STD_DETAIL WHERE POINTS_STD_NO = #{pointsStdNo}

SELECT POINTS_DETAIL_NO, POINTS_STD_NO, ACTION_DIV, BAN_UNIT_SCORE, LIMIT_UNIT_SCORE, QUESTION_UNIT_SCORE, PASS_UNIT_SCORE, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID FROM XBT_POINTS_STD_DETAIL WHERE POINTS_DETAIL_NO = #{pointsDetailNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO XBT_POINTS_STD_DETAIL ( POINTS_STD_NO, ACTION_DIV, BAN_UNIT_SCORE, LIMIT_UNIT_SCORE, QUESTION_UNIT_SCORE, PASS_UNIT_SCORE, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_ID )VALUES( #{pointsStdNo}, #{actionDiv}, #{banUnitScore}, #{limitUnitScore}, #{questionUnitScore}, #{passUnitScore}, now(), #{insertId} )

INSERT INTO XBT_MODULE_INFO_MASTER(MODULE_NM, MODULE_DESC, STUDY_LVL, SLIDE_SPEED, MODULE_TYPE, LEARNING_TYPE, USE_YN, QUESTION_CNT, GUN_SCORE, DEFAULT_SCORE, EXPLOSIVES_SCORE, LIVE_AMMUNITION_SCORE, SWORD_SCORE, WEAPON_SCORE, CAMOUFLAGE_WEAPON_SCORE, TOOL_LIFE_SCORE, FLAMMABILITY_SCORE, DANGER_MATERIALS_SCORE, LIQUID_GEL_SCORE, PASS_SCORE, FAIL_TO_PASS, TIME_LIMIT, MENU_CD, INSERT_ID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE) SELECT #{moduleNm}, MODULE_DESC, STUDY_LVL, SLIDE_SPEED, MODULE_TYPE, LEARNING_TYPE, USE_YN, QUESTION_CNT, GUN_SCORE, DEFAULT_SCORE, EXPLOSIVES_SCORE, LIVE_AMMUNITION_SCORE, SWORD_SCORE, WEAPON_SCORE, CAMOUFLAGE_WEAPON_SCORE, TOOL_LIFE_SCORE, FLAMMABILITY_SCORE, DANGER_MATERIALS_SCORE, LIQUID_GEL_SCORE, PASS_SCORE, FAIL_TO_PASS, TIME_LIMIT, MENU_CD, INSERT_ID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE FROM XBT_MODULE_INFO_MASTER WHERE MODULE_ID = #{targetModuleId}

INSERT INTO XBT_MODULE_INFO_DETAIL(MODULE_ID, STUDY_LVL, BAG_SCAN_ID, UNIT_ID, UNIT_GROUP_CD, ACTION_DIV, ACTION_DIV_NAME, INSERT_ID, INSERT_DATE) SELECT #{moduleId}, STUDY_LVL, BAG_SCAN_ID, UNIT_ID, UNIT_GROUP_CD, ACTION_DIV, ACTION_DIV_NAME, INSERT_ID, INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_MODULE_INFO_DETAIL WHERE MODULE_ID = #{targetModuleId}
